title: Ticket #6780: Changes to defaults for start of 8.9 series
description:
This ticket is for tracking proposed changes to the default values of configuration parameters to be done at the start of the 8.9 development series. These are changes that we deem too risky to make for a stable series without testing first.

Append your ideas below with your name by each item.

HTCondor Param Table Changes

Here are proposed changes that likely just involve settings in the param table.

  1. Set USE_PID_NAMESPACES=True (ToddT)
  2. Set a reasonable default for RESERVED_MEMORY, RESERVED_SWAP, and RESERVED_DISK. Zero is not a reasonable default. :) (ToddT)
    • RESERVED_DISK=0 is reasonable when EXECUTE is on its own partition
  3. WANT_UDP_COMMAND_SOCKET=False
  4. MAX_ACCEPTS_PER_CYCLE=1

Remove Cruft

Add metaknobs

  1. StaticSlots(<min_cpus>[,<min_memory>]) (TJ)

Slightly more involved HTCondor changes

Here are proposed changes that may involve more than just setting defaults in the param table.

  1. Change ENABLE_USERLOG_FSYNC default to False, unless it is the job event log specified for use by condor_dagman, in which case default to True. (ToddT)
  2. Have condor_dagman write its workflow event log into the SPOOL directory for the dagman job. (ToddT)
  3. Keep only dagman event logs in the schedd userlog cache and have USERLOG_FILE_CACHE_MAX default to something much larger than zero?!? (ToddT)
